Headline: #90 Harlem Temporary Southbound Reroute near North Blvd/Forest Ave
ShortDescription: Southbound 90 Harlem buses are temporarily rerouted via Harlem, Randolph, Marion, South Blvd and Harlem: due to, street blockage near  North Blvd/Forest Ave.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #90 Harlem buses are temporarily rerouted via Harlem, Randolph, Marion, South Blvd and Harlem: due to, street blockage near  North Blvd/Forest Ave.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Red Line Delays
ShortDescription: Red Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier police activity at 95th. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Red Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier police activity at 95th. 

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
